downloadTitle: Database Migration Patterns and Target Platform Recommendation
downloadDescription: Database Migration Patterns and Target Platform Recommendation

downloadFile.name: Database Migration Patterns and Target Platform Recommendation.zip
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/f/a/3/fa3d236e-6f13-4303-8497-03983cd34668/Database Migration Patterns and Target Platform Recommendation.zip

detailsSection:
This document talks about 
different migration patterns and recommended target technology or platform based on specific
type of data source, use cases and function points a customer might have. It also talks about 
whether you can do a “Re-host” or need to do “Re-Engineering” and rationale behind it. Finally, it 
gives you some case studies for similar implementation.
detailsSection_file_name: Database Migration Patterns and Target Platform Recommendation.zip
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a zipped folder that contains a Visio file, an Excel Template, License Terms and a Readme pdf.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.
